Articles.Content:
The challenge is land on Duna, then on Ike, then do a flyby of Eve, and return to Kerbin

1. Stock parts only.

2. Take screenshots.

3. Enjoy the views.

Easy Bonus:Optional

1.Land on Gilly

2.Land on Minmus

Hard Bonus:Optional

1.Land on Mun when returning to Kerbin

Manley Bonus:Optional

1.Flyby Moho

2.Flyby Jool

Good luck you brave Kerbalnauts.
